Title: City of Men
Writer: Elena Soarez (screenplay), Roberto Moreira (screenplay collaboration), Paulo Morelli (story), Elena Soarez (story), BrÃ¡ulio Mantovani (inspired by the characters created by)
Actors: Douglas Silva, Darlan Cunha, Jonathan Haagensen, Rodrigo dos Santos
